/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vista. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of nature and architecture that is characteristic of Beijing.
